ios-build.prompt: Help me build and test the iOS app: $input

ipad-build.prompt: Help me build and test the iPadOS app: $input

macos-build.prompt: Help me build and test the macOS app: $input

watch-build.prompt: Help me build and test the watchOS app: $input

android-build.prompt: Help me build and test the Android app: $input

ios-ui.description: iOS UI with Liquid Glass and native components
ios-ui.prompt: @ios-dev @ui-ux I need to create iOS UI: $input. Use NATIVE SwiftUI components. Load the ios-liquid-glass and apple-hig skills. Remember: native first, customize NEVER unless Apple has no solution.

ipad-ui.description: iPadOS UI with Stage Manager, keyboard, and Pencil
ipad-ui.prompt: @ipados-dev @ui-ux I need to create iPadOS UI: $input. Use NavigationSplitView, support keyboard shortcuts, trackpad hover, and Apple Pencil. Load the ipados-features and apple-hig skills.

macos-ui.description: macOS UI with sidebars, menus, and keyboard shortcuts
macos-ui.prompt: @macos-dev @ui-ux I need to create macOS UI: $input. Use NavigationSplitView, Commands for menu bar, keyboard shortcuts for all actions. Load the macos-native and apple-hig skills.

watch-ui.prompt: @watchos-dev @ui-ux I need to create watchOS UI: $input. Keep it simple, glanceable, quick interactions. Load the watchos-patterns skill. Remember: companion app, syncs from iPhone.

android-ui.prompt: @android-dev @ui-ux I need to create Android UI: $input. Follow Material Design 3 and load the android-material3 skill.

apple-ui.description: Cross-platform Apple UI (iOS, iPadOS, macOS shared code)
apple-ui.prompt: @apple-platform @ui-ux I need to create Apple platform UI that works on iOS, iPadOS, and macOS: $input. Use shared SwiftUI code with platform conditionals. Load the apple-hig skill.

native-check.prompt: @ui-ux Review this code for unnecessary customization: $input. Check if any custom UI could be replaced with native SwiftUI components. List all violations of the native-first principle.

sync.prompt: I need to implement this feature on iOS, iPadOS, macOS, watchOS, and Android: $input. Ensure consistent behavior. Use native components on each platform.

mvvm.prompt: @apple-platform Help me with MVVM architecture: $input. Load the swift-mvvm skill. Use @Observable, protocol-based DI.

mvi.prompt: @android-dev Help me with MVI architecture: $input. Load the kotlin-mvi skill.

stage-manager.prompt: @ipados-dev Help me implement Stage Manager and multi-window support: $input. Load the ipados-features skill.

pencil.prompt: @ipados-dev Help me implement Apple Pencil support: $input. Load the ipados-features skill for PencilKit patterns.

keyboard.prompt: @ipados-dev @macos-dev Help me implement keyboard shortcuts: $input. Use .keyboardShortcut and Commands.

watch-sync.prompt: @watchos-dev Help me implement WatchConnectivity sync: $input. Load the watchos-patterns skill. Remember: watch is companion, iPhone is source of truth.

complication.prompt: @watchos-dev Help me create a watchOS complication: $input. Load the watchos-patterns skill.

hig.prompt: @ui-ux Review this for Apple HIG compliance: $input. Load the apple-hig skill. Check accessibility, touch targets, native components.
